languages.text: {n}Мужчина потрясенно открывает и закрывает рот.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы... только что помогли выжить нескольким хорошим семьям. Я разделю между ними талоны и обязательно скажу, что это Ваша Светлость их облагодетельствовали".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина несколько раз ошалело открывает и закрывает рот.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы... только что помогли выжить нескольким хорошим семьям. Я разделю между ними талоны и обязательно скажу, что это Ваша Светлость их облагодетельствовали".

languages.text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина потрясенно открывает и закрывает рот.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы... только что помогли выжить нескольким хорошим семьям. Я разделю между ними талоны и обязательно скажу, что это Ваша Светлость их облагодетельствовали".

traits.locale_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the coupons among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

{n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the coupons among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

{n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the coupons among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

{n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

{n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

languages.text: {n}El capataz abre y cierra la boca, sin apenas dar crédito.{/n} «Lord Capitán, muchas familias podrán sobrevivir gracias a usted. Repartiré las tarjetas entre ellas y me aseguraré de que sepan que ha sido usted quien les ha salvado».
languages.original_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capataz abre y cierra la boca, sin apenas dar crédito.{/n} «Lord Capitán, muchas familias podrán sobrevivir gracias a usted. Repartiré las tarjetas entre ellas y me aseguraré de que sepan que ha sido usted quien les ha salvado».

languages.text: {n}彼は驚いて口を開けては閉じた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたは善良な家族の生存を助けたのです。彼らにカードを分け、この素晴らしい行いをしてくれたのは陛下だと伝えます」
languages.original_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は驚いて口を開けては閉じた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたは善良な家族の生存を助けたのです。彼らにカードを分け、この素晴らしい行いをしてくれたのは陛下だと伝えます」

languages.text: {n}他惊讶地张大了嘴巴，之后闭上了嘴。{/n}“舰长大人，您刚刚救助了很多好人。我会把这些配给卡分给那些人的，而且我会告诉他们，是舰长大人您亲自赐予了他们这样的恩惠。”
languages.original_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

traits.locale_text: {n}他惊讶地张大了嘴巴，之后闭上了嘴。{/n}“舰长大人，您刚刚救助了很多好人。我会把这些配给卡分给那些人的，而且我会告诉他们，是舰长大人您亲自赐予了他们这样的恩惠。”

languages.text: {n}Er öffnet und schließt erstaunt den Mund.{/n} "Lord Captain, ihr habt gerade das Überleben einige guter Familie gesichert. Ich werde die Karten unter ihnen verteilen und sie wissen lassen, dass Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} für diese gute Tat verantwortlich war."
languages.original_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er öffnet und schließt erstaunt den Mund.{/n} "Lord Captain, ihr habt gerade das Überleben einige guter Familie gesichert. Ich werde die Karten unter ihnen verteilen und sie wissen lassen, dass Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} für diese gute Tat verantwortlich war."

languages.text: {n}Il ouvre la bouche d'un air ébahi avant de la refermer aussi sec.{/n} « Grâce à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, d'honnêtes familles de travailleurs vont pouvoir survivre. Je veillerai à ce que ces tickets soient distribués équitablement, et je leur ferai savoir le nom de leur {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice}. »
languages.original_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il ouvre la bouche d'un air ébahi avant de la refermer aussi sec.{/n} « Grâce à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, d'honnêtes familles de travailleurs vont pouvoir survivre. Je veillerai à ce que ces tickets soient distribués équitablement, et je leur ferai savoir le nom de leur {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice}. »

languages.text: {n}Şaşkınlık içinde ağzını açıp kapatıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bu yaptığınızla pek çok iyi ailenin hayatta kalmasına yardımcı oldunuz. Kartları aralarında bölüştürecek ve onlara bu lütfu bahşedenin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri olduğunu muhakkak söyleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}He opens and closes his mouth in astonishment.{/n} "Lord Captain, you've just helped some good families survive. I'll divide the cards among them and be sure to tell them that it was Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} who did them this good turn."
